quickStart.subtext: Get started with using Locale in your workflows and understand how it fits in to your decision making process

quickStart.title: Learn about locale
quickStart.subtext: Read through our docs and articles to know more about locale and how you can start using it!

changeLog.title: Discover Actionability: Workflows(Beta)
changeLog.subtext: Now you can take actions from Locale. Currently we support only slack messages. More to come soon.

changeLog.title: Feature Release: Clusters
changeLog.subtext: With clusters, you can now monitor and take actions in your focus areas filtered on multiple metrics.

exploreLocale.title: Explore Docs and Guides
exploreLocale.description: Like to read? Go ahead and read about how Locale can help you improve your business.

exploreLocale.title: Watch Tuorials and Videos
exploreLocale.description: Want to binge without guilt on a workday? Binge on us to get better at what you do.

exploreLocale.title: Invite New Members
exploreLocale.description: Want more people in your organisation to use Locale? Invite them for Free!

exploreLocale.title: The Locale Blog
exploreLocale.description: Travel through the geospatial space. One-piece at a time. Let us give you some insights.
